name: Mage Enlightenment
description: The path of magical enlightenment requires
deep understanding of the arcane forces.
Study under master mages and unlock
the true potential of your magical abilities.

dialogs.start1: The path to magical enlightenment is not easy, young mage.
dialogs.start2: You must master all schools of elemental magic.
dialogs.start3: Only then will you achieve true arcane enlightenment.
dialogs.progress2: The arcane forces respond more readily to your call.
dialogs.complete1: Congratulations! You have achieved magical enlightenment!
dialogs.complete2: You are now recognized as a true master of the arcane arts.
